channel.title: Wordpress help
channel.description:
http://www.young-guns.biz/new/news I am trying to make it show author, date and tags on the news items however it doesnt seem to be producing it. The news items are produced via posts, my static page is set to home and posts page is set to news I have set the template for the news page to news-template.php and here is its code: [code] /** * The template for displaying News Posts. * * @package WordPress * @subpackage Young_Guns * @since Young Guns 1.0 * @Template Name: News */

by in
Tags: ', ', ', '

'); ?>

[/code] I must be doing something wrong, do you have any ideas?

item.title: Wordpress help
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

http://www.young-guns.biz/new/news

I am trying to make it show author, date and tags on the news items however it doesnt seem to be producing it.

The news items are produced via posts, my static page is set to home and posts page is set to news

I have set the template for the news page to news-template.php and here is its code:

/**
 * The template for displaying News Posts.
 *
 * @package WordPress
 * @subpackage Young_Guns
 * @since Young Guns 1.0
 * @Template Name: News
 */
	<?php get_header(); ?>
	<?php if (have_posts()) : while (have_posts()) : the_post(); ?>
		<h1><a href="<?php the_permalink() ?>" title="<?php the_title(); ?>" rel="bookmark"><?php the_title(); ?></a></h1>
		<div class="details"><?php the_time('F jS, Y') ?> by <?php the_author() ?> in <?php the_category(', '); ?></div>
		<?php the_content('Read the rest of this entry »'); ?>
		<div class="details"><?php the_tags( '<p class="post-info">Tags: ', ', ', '</p>'); ?></div>
		<br />				
	<?php endwhile; endif; ?>
	<?php get_footer(); ?>

I must be doing something wrong, do you have any ideas?

Read full topic
